contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 21, 1971 D NWABBA Contest (Second Section)
NWABBA Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest north-west-association-contest-second-section
Lorenzo
Pembroke Halls, Worsley, Lancashire Best cornet - C.Andrews - Lancashire Constabulary. Best horn - Newton Heath. Best trombone - Stretford Old. Best euphonium - Walkden. Best soprano - Dove Holes. Prizes - 1st £35 cup and rose bowl, 2nd £25 and cup, 3rd £15 and trophy, 4th cup.
April 9, 2012, 11:14 a.m. June 18, 2016, 10:58 a.m.
1 Walkden Band E. Vint
2 Skelmersdale Prize Band William Lyon
3 Tyldesley Band Brian Peacock
4 Stretford Band E. R. Harris
Unknown Result British Aerospace (Chadderton) Stanley Whiteman
Unknown Result Lancashire Constabulary Band Frank Hough
Unknown Result Dove Holes Band R. Ball
Withdrawn BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Stanley Whiteman
Withdrawn Cheetham Hill Band N. Coglan
Withdrawn Stalybridge Old Band Les Hine
